name: actions_list-selected-repositories-enabled-github-actions-organization
description:
Lists the selected repositories that are enabled for GitHub Actions in an organization. To use this endpoint, the organization permission policy for `enabled_repositories` must be configured to `selected`. For more information, see "[Set GitHub Actions permissions for an organization](#set-github-actions-permissions-for-an-organization)."

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint. GitHub Apps must have the `administration` organization permission to use this API.

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
